title: YcoConfig
description: A schema for the yco.config.json of the yco library.

triggerKey.description: Hotkey in SKHD Format which will trigger the switch-focus command.

app.description: App to focus on hotkey-press (needs to match with the 'app' property of the yabai-window).

layoutModeTriggerKey.description: Hotkey in SKHD Format which will trigger the apply-layout command.

spaces.description: One array for each display of your setup.

items.description: One array for each space you'd like to configure for this display.
Array of all windows you'd like to configure for the space.
App to be moved to this space of this display (needs to match with the 'app' property of the yabai-window).
